metadata.title: CVE-2020-8163 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The is a code injection vulnerability in versions of Rails prior to 5.0.1that wouldallow an attacker who controlled the `locals` argument of a`render` call to perform a RCE.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
